name: gclient setup

env.GYP_DEFINES: component=static_library dcheck_always_on=1 disable_glibcxx_debug=1 gomadir='[BUILD]/goma' internal_gles2_conform_tests=1 target_arch=x64 test_isolation_mode=archive test_isolation_outdir=https://isolateserver.appspot.com use_goma=1

name: find isolated tests
~followup_annotations: @@@SET_BUILD_PROPERTY@swarm_hashes@{"content_gl_tests": "[dummy hash for content_gl_tests]", "tab_capture_end2end_tests": "[dummy hash for tab_capture_end2end_tests]", "gles2_conform_test": "[dummy hash for gles2_conform_test]", "gl_tests": "[dummy hash for gl_tests]", "angle_unittests": "[dummy hash for angle_unittests]", "telemetry_gpu_test": "[dummy hash for telemetry_gpu_test]"}@@@
